Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: chopsticks \chop"sticks`\ (ch[o^]p"st[i^]ks`), n. {chopstick} (ch[o^]p"st[i^]k`), 1. a pair of slender sticks made of wood, ivory, plastic, etc., used chiefly by the Chinese and Japanese to lift food into the mouth while dining; -- also commonly used around the world by persons of Oriental heritage or in restaurants serving oriental food. [1913 Webster + WordNet 1.5]
chopsticks n : oriental tableware consisting of a pair of sticks used to eat food with [syn: {chopstick}]
